official_title: Implementation of Low Cost Solutions to Help Facilitate Linkage to Care for Persons with Hepatitis C Virus Infection
inclusion_criteria:
Inclusion criteria:

* 18 years or older, positive Hepatitis C antibody test,
* elevated Hepatitis C RNA
* history of substance use disorder

Exclusion criteria:

* under 18 years old,
* history of treatment of Hepatitis C infection
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
